description.english: Defeat Mammon Lord of Hell.
description.french: Triomphez de Mammon Seigneur de l’Enfer.
description.italian: Sconfiggi Mammon Signore dell'Inferno
description.spanish: Derrota a Ammón señor del Infierno.
description.schinese: 击败地狱之王玛蒙。
description.japanese: 地獄の王マモンを撃破する。
description.brazilian: Derrote Mamon o Senhor do Inferno.

description.english: Defeat Belial Lord of Hell.
description.french: Triomphez de Belial seigneur de l’Enfer
description.italian: Sconfiggi Belial Signore dell'Inferno
description.spanish: Derrota a Belial señor del Infierno.
description.schinese: 击败地狱之王彼列。
description.japanese: 地獄の王ベリアルを倒す。
description.brazilian: Derrote Belial o Senhor do Inferno.

description.english: Defeat Astarte Fallen Angel.
description.french: Triomphez d’Astarte l’ange déchu.
description.italian: Sconfiggi Astarte Angelo caduto
description.spanish: Derrota a Astarté el ángel caído.
description.schinese: 击败堕落天使阿施塔特
description.japanese: 堕天使アスタルテを倒す。
description.brazilian: Derrote Astarte o Anjo Caído.

description.english: Defeat Dagon Lord of Hell.
description.french: Triomphez de Dagon seigneur de l’Enfer.
description.italian: Sconfiggi Dagon Signore dell'Inferno
description.spanish: Derrota a Dagón señor del Infierno.
description.schinese: 击败地狱之王大衮。
description.japanese: 地獄の王ダゴンを倒す。
description.brazilian: Derrote Dagon o Senhor do Inferno.

description.english: Defeat Moloch Lord of Hell.
description.french: Triomphez de Moloch seigneur de l’Enfer.
description.italian: Sconfiggi Moloch Signore dell'Inferno.
description.spanish: Derrota a Moloch señor del Infierno.
description.schinese: 击败地狱之王摩洛克。
description.japanese: 地獄の王モロクを撃破する。
description.brazilian: Derrote Moloch o Senhor do Inferno.

description.english: Achieve a score of 70000 or higher in the arena.
description.german: Erreiche eine Arenawertung von 70.000 oder höher.
description.french: Obtenez un score de 70 000 ou plus dans l’Arène.
description.italian: Ottieni un punteggio di 70.000 o superiore nell'arena.
description.spanish: Consigue una puntuación de 70.000 o superior en la arena.
description.schinese: 在竞技场中获得70000分或者更高的分数。
description.russian: Набрать на Арене не менее 70 000 очков
description.japanese: アリーナでスコア70000以上を達成する。
description.polish: Osi?gnij na arenie wynik 70 000 lub wy?szy.
description.brazilian: Consiga um placar de 70.000 ou mais na arena.

description.english: Complete all 17 levels on Hard difficulty.
description.german: Schließe alle 17 Stufen auf Schwer ab.
description.french: Terminez les 17 niveaux du jeu à la difficulté Difficile.
description.italian: Completa tutti i 17 livelli a difficoltà Difficile.
description.spanish: Completa los 17 niveles en dificultad Alta.
description.schinese: 在困难难度下完成所有17关。
description.japanese: 難易度「ハード」で全17レベルをクリアする。
description.polish: Uko?cz wszystkie 17 poziomów na poziomie trudno?ci Trudny.
description.brazilian: Conclua os 17 níveis no modo Difícil.

description.english: Complete all 17 levels on Apocalyptic difficulty.
description.german: Schließe alle 17 Stufen auf Apokalyptisch ab.
description.french: Terminez les 17 niveaux du jeu à la difficulté Apocalyptique.
description.italian: Completa tutti i 17 livelli a difficoltà Apocalittica.
description.spanish: Completa los 17 niveles en dificultad Apocalíptica.
description.schinese: 在天启难度下完成所有17关。
description.japanese: 難易度「アポカリプティック」で全17レベルをクリアする。
description.polish: Uko?cz wszystkie 17 poziomów na poziomie trudno?ci Apokalipsa.
description.brazilian: Conclua os 17 níveis na dificuldade Apocalíptica.

description.english: Learn all 3 of Strife's Wrath abilities.
description.french: Apprenez les trois capacités de Courroux de Discorde.
description.italian: Impara tutte e tre le Abilità Collera di Conflitto.
description.spanish: Aprende las tres habilidades de ira de Lucha.
description.schinese: 将祸乱的3种神怒能力全部习得。
description.russian: Раздор должен выучить все 3 способности Гнева.
description.japanese: ストライフのラスアビリティを3種類すべて覚える。
description.brazilian: Aprenda as 3 Habilidades de Fúria de Conflito.

description.english: Learn all 3 of War's Wrath abilities.
description.french: Apprenez les trois capacités de Courroux de Guerre.
description.italian: Impara tutte e tre le Abilità Collera di Guerra.
description.spanish: Aprende las tres habilidades de ira de Guerra.
description.schinese: 将战争的3种神怒能力全部习得。
description.russian: Война должен выучить все 3 способности Гнева.
description.japanese: ウォーのラスアビリティを3種類すべて覚える。
description.brazilian: Aprenda as 3 Habilidades de Fúria de Guerra.

displayName.italian: Un proiettile per tutte le stagioni
displayName.spanish: Una bala para todas las estaciones

description.english: Find all 5 of Strife's elemental ammo types.
description.french: Trouvez les cinq types de munitions élémentaires de Discorde.
description.italian: Trova tutti e cinque i tipi di munizioni degli elementi di Conflitto.
description.koreana: 분쟁의 원소 탄약 유형 5개를 모두 찾으십시오.
description.spanish: Encuentra los cinco tipos de munición elemental de Lucha.
description.schinese: 将祸乱的5种元素弹药类型全部找到。
description.russian: Найти все 5 типов стихийных зарядов Раздора
description.japanese: ストライフのエレメンタル弾丸を5種類すべて発見する。
description.brazilian: Encontre as 5 munições elementais de Conflito.

description.english: Find all 5 of War's elemental enhancements.
description.french: Trouvez les cinq améliorations élémentaires de Guerre.
description.italian: Trova tutti e cinque i Potenziamenti Arma elementali di Guerra.
description.spanish: Encuentra las cinco mejoras elementales de Guerra.
description.schinese: 将战争的5种元素附魔全部找到。
description.russian: Найти все 5 стихийных улучшений для Войны.
description.japanese: ウォーのエレメンタル強化を5種類すべて見つける。
description.brazilian: Encontre os 5 aprimoramentos elementais de Guerra.

description.english: Collect every type of creature core.
description.french: Collectez chaque type de cœur de créature.
description.italian: Ottieni ogni tipo di Nucleo di creatura.
description.spanish: Consigue todos los tipos de núcleo de criatura.
description.schinese: 收集所有类型的生物核心。
description.japanese: クリーチャーコアを全種類集める。
description.polish: Zbierz po 1 z ka?dego typu Rdzeni Istoty.
description.brazilian: Colete todos os tipos de cerne de criatura.

description.english: Collect 50 Boatman Coins.
description.french: Collectez 50 pièces du Passeur.
description.italian: Colleziona 50 monete del Traghettatore.
description.spanish: Consigue 50 monedas del Barquero.
description.schinese: 收集50个船夫金币
description.japanese: 船乗りのコインを50枚集める。
description.brazilian: Consiga 50 Moedas do Barqueiro.

description.english: Collect 200 Boatman Coins.
description.french: Collectez 200 pièces du Passeur.
description.italian: Colleziona 200 monete del Traghettatore.
description.spanish: Consigue 200 monedas del Barquero.
description.schinese: 收集200个船夫金币
description.japanese: 船乗りのコインを200枚集める。
description.brazilian: Consiga 200 Moedas do Barqueiro.

description.english: Collect 350 Boatman Coins.
description.french: Collectez 350 pièces du Passeur.
description.italian: Colleziona 350 monete del Traghettatore.
description.spanish: Consigue 350 monedas del  Barquero.
description.schinese: 收集350个船夫金币
description.japanese: 船乗りのコインを350枚集める。
description.brazilian: Consiga 350 Moedas do Barqueiro.

description.english: Destroy all 4 Soul Caches in The Slag Pit.
description.german: Zerstöre die 4 Seelenlager in der Schlackegrube.
description.french: Détruisez les quatre amas d’âmes dans la fosse de scories.
description.italian: Distruggi tutti e 4 gli Scrigni di anime nella Fossa delle scorie.
description.koreana: 슬래그 구덩이에서 영혼 은닉처 4개를 전부 파괴하십시오.
description.spanish: Destruye las 4 reservas de almas del Foso de la Depravación.
description.schinese: 摧毁熔渣矿坑的所有4个灵魂私藏。
description.russian: Уничтожить все 4 ячейки для душ в Шлаковой Яме
description.japanese: スラグピットで4つソウルキャッシュをすべて壊す。
description.polish: Zniszcz wszystkie 4 skrytki na dusze w Jaskini Popio?ów.
description.brazilian: Destrua os 4 Baús de Almas no Fosso das Cinzas.

description.english: Gather all the ingots in the Inferno Vault and take them to Hell's Forge.
description.german: Sammle alle Barren in der Infernokammer und bring sie zur Glutschmiede.
description.french: Collectez tous les lingots dans la voûte des Enfers et apportez-les à la Forge d’Ignescence.
description.italian: Raccogli tutti i lingotti nella Cripta infernale e portali alla Forgia infernale.
description.koreana: 지옥 금고에서 주괴를 전부 모은 다음 지옥용광로로 가져가십시오.
description.spanish: Consigue todos los lingotes de la Cámara Infernal y llévalos a la Fragua Infernal.
description.schinese: 收集恐怖地穴里的所有金属块并把它们带到地狱熔炉。
description.russian: Собрать все слитки в Хранилище Преисподней и отнести их в Адскую Кузню.
description.japanese: 烈火の金庫のインゴットを全て回収してヘルフォージに運ぶ。
description.polish: Zbierz wszystkie sztabki w Piekielnym Skarbcu i zanie? je do Piekielnej Ku?ni.
description.brazilian: Pegue todos os lingotes da Câmara Infernal e leve à Forja Infernal.

description.english: Close the rift leaking void creatures in Icebind Cavern.
description.german: Schließe den Riss voller Leerekreaturen in der Eisbannhöhle.
description.french: Refermez la faille de laquelle émergent les créatures du Néant dans la Grotte des entraves glacées.
description.italian: Chiudi la frattura attraverso cui fuoriescono le creature del Vuoto in
description.koreana: 아이드바인드 동굴에서 공허 피조물이 새어 나오는 균열을 닫으십시오.
description.spanish: Cierra la grieta por la que escapan criaturas del Vacío en la Caverna Gélida.
description.schinese: 关闭冰缚洞穴中不断吐出虚空生物的裂隙。
description.russian: Закрыть в Ледяной пещере разрыв из которого выбираются чудовища бездны.
description.japanese: アイスバインドキャヴァーンでヴォイドの怪物が漏れ出している亀裂を閉じる。
description.polish: Zamknij szczelin? przez któr? do Mro?nej Groty wydostaj? si? z pustki potwory.
description.brazilian: Feche a fenda que está liberando criaturas do vazio na Caverna Congelada.

description.english: Defeat less than 5 hounds before killing the Houndmaster in The Horde.
description.german: Besiege weniger als 5 Hunde bevor du den Hundemeister in der Horde erledigst.
description.french: Tuez moins de 5 chiens des Enfers avant de tuer le Maître-chien dans le Trésor.
description.italian: Uccidi meno di 5 segugi prima di uccidere il Maestro dei Segugi in
description.koreana: 보물 더미에서 사냥개를 5마리 이상 죽이지 말고 사냥개 조련사를 처치하십시오.
description.spanish: Derrota menos de 5 fieras antes de destruir al amo de la jauría en la Horda.
description.schinese: 在宝库中杀死训犬师之前击败少于5条的地狱犬。
description.russian: Убить Псаря в Орде победив до этого менее 5 псов.
description.japanese: ホードで排除したハウンドが5頭未満の間にハウンドマスターを倒す。
description.polish: Pokonaj mniej ni? 5 ogarów przed zabiciem W?adcy Ogarów w Hordzie.
description.brazilian: Derrote menos de 5 cães antes de matar o Mestre da Matilha na Horda.

displayName.japanese: デッドコートの湿った宮殿の地図。

description.english: Defeat the Dread Lord's subjects in Decay.
description.german: Besiege die Diener des Todschreiters in der Fäulnis.
description.french: Triomphez des sujets du Seigneur des rôdeurs sépulcraux dans Déclin.
description.italian: Uccidi i sudditi del Signore dei defunti in
description.spanish: Derrota a los súbditos del Señor Muerto en Putrefacción.
description.schinese: 在衰败中杀死恐惧领主的仆从。
description.russian: Победить подручных Повелителя Ужаса в Разложении.
description.japanese: ディケイにいるドレッドロードの手下を倒す。
description.polish: Zabij podw?adnych Lorda Postrachu w Zgnili?nie.
description.brazilian: Derrote os lacaios do Senhor do Medo na Decomposição.

displayName.english: Why'd It Have to Be Snakes?
displayName.french: Des serpents fallait que ce soient des serpents !
displayName.brazilian: Por que Tinham que Ser Cobras?

description.english: Defeat every snake in Decay.
description.german: Besiege alle Schlangen in der Fäulnis.
description.french: Tuez tous les serpents dans Déclin.
description.italian: Uccidi tutti i serpenti in
description.spanish: Derrota todas las serpientes de Putrefacción.
description.schinese: 在衰败中击败每一条蛇。
description.japanese: ディケイで蛇をすべて倒す。
description.brazilian: Derrote todas as cobras no capítulo Decomposição.

description.english: Save the uncorrupted angels in Bastion's Fall
description.german: Rette die unverdorbenen Engel in Festungssturz.
description.french: Sauvez les anges qui ont échappé à la corruption dans le Cœur d’Éden.
description.italian: Salva gli angeli non corrotti nell'Eden Primigenio.
description.spanish: Salva a los ángeles no corrompidos del Edén principal.
description.schinese: 拯救堡垒的陷落中的堕落天使。
description.russian: Спасти нетронутых порчей ангелов в Бастионе
description.japanese: バスティオンズフォールで堕落していない天使を救う
description.polish: Uratuj niedotkni?te zepsuciem anio?y w Upadku Bastionu
description.brazilian: Salve os anjos não corrompidos na Ruína do Baluarte.

description.english: Defeat the grub queen in The Maelstrom.
description.french: Triomphez de la reine des larves dans la Tourmente.
description.italian: Uccidi la Larva regina nel Maelstrom.
description.spanish: Derrota a la reina de las larvas en el Huracán.
description.schinese: 在大漩涡里击败蛆虫虫后。
description.japanese: メールストロームにいるグラブクイーンを倒す。
description.brazilian: Derrote a Rainha Verme na Voragem.

description.english: Destroy all 12 of Moloch's supply caches in War Machine.
description.german: Zerstöre alle 12 Vorratslager von Moloch in Kriegsmaschine.
description.french: Détruisez les 12 caisses de ravitaillement de Moloch dans Machine de guerre.
description.italian: Distruggi tutte e 12 le casse di rifornimenti di Moloch in
description.koreana: 전쟁기계에서 몰록의 보급품 은닉처 12곳을 전부 파괴하십시오.
description.spanish: Destruye las 12 reservas de Moloch en la Máquina Bélica.
description.schinese: 在战争机器中摧毁所有12个摩洛克的补给私藏。
description.russian: Уничтожить все 12 тайников Молоха в Военной Машине.
description.japanese: 軍事施設にあるモロクの補給物資を12個全部壊す。
description.polish: Zniszcz ka?dy z 12 sk?adów zapasów Molocha w Machinie Wojennej.
description.brazilian: Destrua os 12 baús de suprimentos de Moloch na Máquina de Guerra.

description.english: Destroy 10 structures in War Machine.
description.french: Détruisez 10 structures dans Machine de guerre.
description.italian: Distruggi 10 strutture in
description.spanish: Destruye 10 estructuras en la Máquina Bélica.
description.schinese: 在战争机器中摧毁10座建筑。
description.japanese: 軍事施設で構造体を10個破壊する。
description.brazilian: Destrua 10 estruturas no capítulo Máquina de Guerra.

description.english: Defeat Moloch without taking damage.
description.german: Besiege Moloch ohne Schaden zu nehmen.
description.french: Triomphez de Moloch sans subir de dégâts.
description.italian: Sconfiggi Moloch senza subire danni.
description.spanish: Derrota a Moloch sin sufrir daños.
description.schinese: 在未受到任何伤害的情况下击败摩洛克。
description.japanese: ダメージを受けずにモロクを撃破する。
description.brazilian: Derrote Moloch sem receber dano.

description.english: Collect every Boatman Coin in the Boatman's Labyrinth.
description.french: Collectez toutes les pièces du Passeur dans le Labyrinthe du Passeur.
description.italian: Ottieni tutte le monete del Traghettatore nel Labirinto del Traghettatore.
description.koreana: 선원의 미궁에서 선원의 주화를 전부 수집하십시오.
description.spanish: Consigue todas las monedas en el laberinto del Barquero.
description.schinese: 收集船夫迷宫中的所有船夫金币。
description.russian: Собрать все монеты лодочника в лабиринте лодочника.
description.japanese: 船乗りの迷宮で船乗りのコインをすべて集める。
description.polish: Zbierz wszystkie Monety Przewo?nika w Labiryncie Przewo?nika.
description.brazilian: Colete todas as Moedas do Barqueiro no Labirinto do Barqueiro.

description.english: Unlock every Trickster Door.
description.french: Ouvrez toutes les portes du Mystificateur.
description.italian: Sblocca tutte le Porte dell'Inganno.
description.spanish: Desbloquea todas las puertas enigmáticas.
description.schinese: 打开每一扇欺诈师之门。
description.japanese: すべてのトリックスタードアを解錠する。
description.brazilian: Destranque todas as Portas do Trapaceiro.

displayName.japanese: ウィキッド・キリングトン

description.english: Face the Trickster himself Wicked Killington.
description.german: Stelle dich dem Gauner Wicked Killington.
description.french: Affrontez le Mystificateur Wicked Killington en personne.
description.italian: Affronta l'Ingannatore in persona il Perfido Killington.
description.spanish: Enfréntate a Killington el Malvado el embaucador.
description.schinese: 迎战欺诈师本人，邪恶凯灵顿。
description.russian: Сразиться с самим Ловкачом - Злобным Киллингтоном.
description.japanese: トリックスターの化身ウィキッドキリングトンと対決する。
description.polish: Zmierz si? z Oszustem Killingtonem Nikczemnym.
description.brazilian: Enfrente Killington o Trapaceiro Perverso
